wikipedia_page.main: Keri Lees (née Maddox; born 4 July 1972 in Stone, Staffordshire is a female retired English athlete.

response: * Keri Lees (born 1972 in Stone)Sports Reference LLC website retrieved 30 September 2017 retired English athlete, competed in the 100 & 400 metres hurdles at the 2000 Summer Olympics
